snippet.title: DieFeen (v1.50) Normal 1CC - Ariel (Corner/Follow/Cross)
snippet.description:
also known as ねこみみのかけら
This game is... really weird. I don't think it was playtested at all.
The main problem is the game is actually just unfair for the most part, mostly for the amout of enemies from behind that you can't really deal with.
The only way to clear the game is using "corner", it's crazy strong.

You unlock type edit after 1CC eight times. 
I made an AFK Cheat engine script so the game plays for me, and only after that I could actually stand a chance, and to be fair, now it's way too easy!
Biggest problem is: you only get 3 lifes, and you lose them so easily. The bombs are also really bad.
I tried routing hardmode but the final boss is actually impossible. https://imgur.com/a/Zfj2Zy4

Oh yea, also for the good ending you must no miss no bomb the game.
